Creates an {{tt|observer_ptr}} object, deducing the template argument from the type of the function argument.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|pointer to the object to be watched by the {{tt|observer_ptr}} object}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A {{tt|observer_ptr}} object, created as if by {{c|std::experimental::observer_ptr&lt;W&gt;(p)}}.
